CeReNeM Showcase

CeReNeM is the University of Huddersfield music department research centre in today’s music practices. It covers a wide breadth of performance, composition, coding and musicological practices. At Zero Parameters, it will be represented by four members: Alex Harker (gt), Anthony Stillabower (sn), Pierre Alexandre Tremblay (bs) and Sophie Cooper (tb).

The four improvising mixed musickers will perform short improvised sets in solos and duets, around their setup of instruments and electronics, providing a glimpse of the breadth of practices in the CeReNeM research community.
